title: 11/10/20: For Nethris and Desjardins users, the name of your payroll export files will include the payroll company number
content: If you do payroll for several companies and you are a Nethris or Desjardins user, the following new feature will simplify your organization and prevent errors.In fact, during the next update of Emprez, the payroll files of Nethris and Desjardins will have a new name that will include the company number.Example:The name of the payroll export file before: NethrisThe name of the payroll export file now: Nethris-00043928.txtHelpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
